title: S5 Ep61: Backstage at BAM19: Designing a competition policy fit for Europe's needs.
itunes:title: Backstage at BAM19: Designing a competition policy fit for Europe's needs.
description: Should competition policy adjust to current concerns and support industrial policy? How can we contextualise long-run consumer welfare? How can we maintain independence and objectivity in enforcement? In this podcast, Rebecca Christie discusses competition policy, with Mathew Heim.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
